registration.title: Who are you?
registration.description: Please enter your name to play. Your email address is optional. Please note we have a code of conduct, so don't be too silly.
registration.accept-terms: My information is compliant with the Code of Conduct

join.title: Join a game
join.description: In order to join a game, enter the game code or scan the QR code.

exclusionreasons.generalsystemmisuse: You are locked out in suspect of general system misuse
exclusionreasons.codeofconductviolation: You are locked out, you broke our code of conduct
